p: Membranes and zymograms were captured in a 1D Kodak Image station (Kodak 550, Eastman Kodak Company, Sci. Imaging Systems, Rochester, NY, USA) and exported as 16-tiff converted images (1D Kodak Image Analysis Software). Single integrated optical density values (Intdensity) were registered for each group by means of 1D ImageJ software (ImageJ ver. 1.43; NIH- http://rsb.info.nih.gov/ij/) and assembled with minor modifications by Adobe photoshop 7.0 (Abacus concepts).
